ColorShapeLinks AI
An AI competition for the IEEE Conference on Games
LoserSleeperAIThinker.cs
1 
9 using System.Threading;
10 
11 namespace ColorShapeLinks.Common.AI.Examples
12 {
17  public class LoserSleeperAIThinker : AbstractThinker
18  {
21  public override FutureMove Think(Board board, CancellationToken ct)
22  {
23  // Is this task to be cancelled?
24  while (true)
25  {
26  // Wait enough millisseconds to lose
27  Thread.Sleep(TimeLimitMillis + 1);
28 
29  // The task will eventually be cancelled due to a timeout
30  if (ct.IsCancellationRequested) break;
31  }
32 
33  // Eventually return a "no move"
34  return FutureMove.NoMove;
35  }
36  }
37 }
ColorShapeLinks.Common.AI.AbstractThinker
The actual AI code of specific AIs should be placed in classes which extend this class.
